title: Brandon Lewis – 2022 Speech at the Approbation Ceremony for the New Lord Mayor of London
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Brandon Lewis, the Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice, at the Robing Room at the Palace of Westminster on 17 October 2022.
content:
My Lord Mayor Elect, I am commanded by His Majesty the King to express His Majesty’s express approval of the choice of the citizens of London in electing you to be Lord Mayor for the coming year.
